title: Group Therapy: She Doesn't Want To Go On The Family Cabin Trip
description: A listener is dealing with a mother-in-law situation. Basically she doesn't see eye to eye with her mother-in-law and the MIL has been rude on multiple occasions   and now she's trying to figure out a way to get out of going on the family cabin trip to avoid spending time with her.
itunes:summary: A listener is dealing with a mother-in-law situation. Basically she doesn't see eye to eye with her mother-in-law and the MIL has been rude on multiple occasions   and now she's trying to figure out a way to get out of going on the family cabin trip to avoid spending time with her.
